teetime.stage.taskfarm

Class TaskFarmStage<I,O,T extends ITaskFarmDuplicable<I,O>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • teetime.framework.CompositeStage
      • teetime.stage.taskfarm.TaskFarmStage<I,O,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Input type of Task Farm
    O - Output type of Task Farm
    T - Type of the parallelized stage

    public final class TaskFarmStage<I,O,T extends ITaskFarmDuplicable<I,O>>
extends CompositeStage
    Represents the self-adaptive task farm parallelization pattern in TeeTime. It dynamically adds CPU resources at runtime depending on the current CPU load and the behavior of the parallelized stage.
    Author:
    Christian Claus Wiechmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskFarmStage(T workerStage)
      Create a task farm using a worker stage with a pipe capacity of 100.
      TaskFarmStage(T workerStage, int pipeCapacity)
      Create a task farm using a worker stage with a given pipe capacity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITaskFarmDuplicable<I,O> getBasicEnclosedStage()
      Returns the first instance of the worker stages enclosed in the task farm.
      TaskFarmConfiguration<I,O,T> getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration parameters of the task farm.
      DynamicDistributor<I> getDistributor()
      Returns the distributor instance of this task farm.
      List<ITaskFarmDuplicable<I,O>> getEnclosedStageInstances()
      Returns a list of all currently existing worker stages in this task farm.
      InputPort<I> getInputPort()
      Returns the input port of the task farm/distributor of the task farm.
      DynamicMerger<O> getMerger()
      Returns the merger instance of this task farm.
      OutputPort<O> getOutputPort()
      Returns the output port of the task farm/merger of the task farm.
      PipeMonitoringService getPipeMonitoringService()
      Returns the monitoring service of this task farm regarding pipe throughputs.
      SingleTaskFarmMonitoringService getTaskFarmMonitoringService()
      Returns the monitoring service of this task farm regarding performance of the whole task farm.
